title: Mind the instructions: Reward cues are liked first, wanted later
content:
Publication date: October 2024

Source: Cognition, Volume 251

Author(s): Nicoleta Prutean, Luc Vermeylen, Nanne Kukkonen, S. Tabitha Steendam, Joshua O. Eayrs, Ruth M. Krebs, Jan R. Wiersema, Eliana Vassena, C. Nico Boehler, Wim Notebaert
